tag_list: mobile-application, ios, android, hybrid, product, startup
overview:
Technology Marketing and Product Development Executive with experience in aspects of Web and mobile applications (development), Start-up Strategy, Branding and International Business. Has experience of selling high value products.

Uses his firm grip over Game Theory and his client interactions to maximum by gauging the market trends and is always involved with the product management office.

A strong proponent of ‘deliver value! don’t just promise to’

Hates traffic jams and loves sugar-free jams
